title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1241.14 - Refuse removal
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1241.14 - Refuse removal

State Regulations

All litter, dunnage and refuse of all kinds shall be
cleaned and disposed of by the persons responsible therefor. Otherwise the work
will be performed by the Port Authority and the cost thereof charged against
such persons. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1241.14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
